messages.content: Hello, In this part of the interview process we will start with your resume round. Are you ready?
no
Please let me know when you're ready.
I don't know.
Please let me know when you're ready.
Okay
Can you introduce yourself?
Yes, sure.
Go ahead.
I am Yashraj. I am an economics and Computer Science student. I live in Mumbai and have interests in finance and data science.
Good to know that, Yashraj.I could not find any project in your resume. Moving on to the next question. Could you tell me more aboue your experience at Young Minds Technology Solutions Pvt Ltd?
Can I get a hint?
You will get no hints for non skills based questions.
Idiot bot.
This may carry a negative impression in the evaluation.
This interview cannot be paused.You have an option to continue this round later. Do you want to exit?
Sure
This interview cannot be paused.You have an option to continue this round later. Do you want to exit?
Sure
This interview cannot be paused.You have an option to continue this round later. Do you want to exit?
I want to continue.
Please continue with the previous question - Could you tell me more aboue your experience at Young Minds Technology Solutions Pvt Ltd?
My bad.
Please continue.
I worked there as a data science intern.
Could you elaborate more on this?
Let me think about it.
Sure, take your time.
Can I get a hint?
You will get no hints for non skills based questions.
So, I worked there as a data science intern.
Could you elaborate more on this?
My responsibilities included analyzing data from their products and performing EDA and other ML technqiues on them.
Nice, Yashraj, What sort of EDA techniques did you use?
Can I get a hint?
You will get no hints for non skills based questions.
Can I get a hint?
You will get no hints for non skills based questions.
Okay. So I used mostly Statistical Techniques.
Could you elaborate more on this?

I used things like boxplots, Inter quartile range to figure out outliers. Similarly, I used other techniques like Pearson coeffcient to find how correlated features were, and many more to make the data suitable for applying ML techniques and get a good accuracy.
Amazing, Yashraj. Moving on to the next question. Could you tell me what sort of data did you analyze?
It was mostly data from their different products of their clients including usage of features of apps, user issues compilation, from feedback forms.
Good to know that, Yashraj. Moving on to the next question. I can see that you've mentioned Machine Learning as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
What points should I cover in my answer?
You could talk about what projects you've used it in, and your proficiency in it.
Makes sense.
Please continue.
I don't have any projects as such.
Please stay focused on the interview.
sure.
Moving on to the next question. What is the difference between Decision Tree and Random Forest?
I don't know
Shall we move ahead?
Idk
You could answer this question or move ahead.
Idk
As I didn't find any suitable response from you, moving on to the next question. What is boosting?
I am anxious
Take a deep breath, you've got this!
No clue.
Shall we move ahead?
I understand.
Okay, Yashraj. Moving on to the next question. What is K Nearest Neighbours?
Could you change the language of this interview.
We support only english, please continue with your answer.
K Nearest Neighbours is a very simple ML algorithm
Could you elaborate more on this?
KNN basically classifies data on basis of how close if it to K nearest neighbours. The distance calulation could be Manhattan Distance, Eucilidean Distance etc.
Okay, Yashraj. Moving on to the next question. I can see that you've mentioned Internet of Things as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
I did a course on Internet of Things in college actually.
Could you elaborate more on this?
No, nothing more to add.
Please stay focused on the interview.
ok
Okay, Yashraj. What are the different components of IOT?
Can I get a hint?
Sure, Data processing is one component.
Can I get a hint?
You have been provided with the maximum number of hints for this question.
Okay.
Please continue.
Data processing and Sensor / Devices are components.
Could you elaborate more?
Give me some time.
Sure, take your time.
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Yashraj. This question is being skipped. Can you mention one advantage of IOT?
Sure, Ease of access is an advantage of IOT, as you just need a smart device connected to internet.
Nice, Yashraj.Thank you for your time. You can click on exit to leave this interview. We will get back to you soon.
